ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kunark bards stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: My guild and I went to CoM this weekend as well but try as we might we could not find a key to the damn door.  Anyone have a clue what/who drops it? Thanks!
ygData.messageBody:
My guild and I went to CoM this weekend as well but try as we might we could
not find a key to the damn door. Anyone have a clue what/who drops it?

Thanks!
----- Original Message -----
From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 01, 2000 10:53 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Kunark bards stuff


> We went to City of Mist the first few nights of Kunark and it was great
fun. We eventually got 4 groups in the city and were using AE to pull stuff
from the first level Lord's temple. Sometimes too many reavers would smoosh
us but other times we could deal with them and get the Lord. We have a pile
of jade Reavers, the Thornblades, and the other one I mentioned in my
eariler post. We did see a single reaver, respawn reaver, respawn reaver,
then spawn Lord. There are 2 Lords that I have heard casting and we
eventually them both (iirc).
>
> I looted an Ancient Coin off the Captain of the Guards. Later talked to
the male banker and heard about his coin collection. I guess if you give
him a Star of Odus (buy in Erud for 120pp about) he gives you a 4 slot box
and asks you to fill it with 6 coins (is it just me or are these quests
getting harder?) Anyhow he says he will give you something a "composer" left
with him - sounds like he is hinting at a bard item.
>
> Later on I got another Ancient Coin off bloodfrienzed goblin in Lake of
Ill Omen (they would not pull to shore but they did pull nicely to the
partially submerged platform between the columns. And there seems to be a
not yet open zone portal at the bottom of the lake. Kedge II, Phinnie's
Revenge? Going to be looking for the other coins.
>
> We had some fun in Burining Wood - full group - all 50-52. Pulling more
or less non-stop. Look a 51 Gullerback (sp?), let's charm him... So, our
necro charms him and he makes a good pet: Gullerback_08 says, "You will not
evade me Wurm_18!" Heh, pets that summon.
>
> Ended the weekend in Befallen. Delivered a set of gnome picks to one of
our rogues. She was picking madly to get 200 and at 1.30am when I woke up
from a short nap while singing elergy for her, she was still at 197 - ugh.
Those last few points are extremely hard I guess. Anyone know if there are
any better doors that the Befallen ones?
>
> Sylly
>
> p.s. got to remember to bring some CPA (Cabby Pale Ale) back to the drunks
by the bard merch in FV. Does it bother any one else to see that fem Barb
do the bard animation? And the oger? Well, ogers are down right rude.
>
>
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> You have a voice mail message waiting for you at iHello.com:
> http://click.egroups.com/1/3555/7/_/451022/_/957192868/
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
